item.description: This is going to be a great night of live Blues, Soul and Light Rock with some of New Englands best musicians. Limited seating, 7pm to 11pm. Call the Restaurant and reserve seats.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Clint, Bob or Cecil
item.why: Boston Millionaires & friends are meeting up at the Antique Table Restaurant for an Open Mic evening of live music. Located at 2 Essex St. Lynn, Ma. 01902. Bob leger, Sir Cecil, Lee and many others will be sitting in with the band.
item.name: 06-01-11 Open Mic & Gourmet Pizza Night at Antique Table Restaurant in Lynn, Ma
